system.description:
A fickle demon with hair-trigger temper: loves unloading hot steel upon the battlefield, has hands that are gun-barrels.

(The stats provided here is for a Rank 1 encounter. Check the book for higher ranks.)
system.attacks:
Inflict Violence: Burning Bullet. Attack an enemy in range 5 with Faith, setting aflame.

Gambits [[/r d10]]

1-3: Rush > Inflict Violence > Inflict Violence

4-6: Rush > Heat Up [1]: Gain +2d on your next Burning Bullet > Inflict Violence

7-9: Rush > Fire Cottonflower [2]: Fly 3, attack all fighters in burst 1 with Faith at any point, setting aflame.

10: Overload [2]: Your next attack is made with Bravery + Faith > Unload Gun Devil [1]: Attack all enemies in blast 5 with Bravery.

traits.name: Fester
traits.description: At the start of Resound 2+, all demons fester: their unique trait triggers and they gain +1d to all attacks until the end of the Resound. They fester every start of Resound afterwards.

traits.name: Atrocious Residue
traits.description: When a Demon is Defeated, they discorporate and roll 1 Attack Die on all enemies in the battlefield. Unless the battlefield is purified or cleansed by proper rituals, they will rise again after eighty seven days.

traits.name: Violent Devil God
traits.description: At the start of a Resound, if there are exactly 3 demons left in the battlefield, they may combine into a Violent Devil God: choose one demon as the main body. Add all remaining HP together, and the main body gains +1 to all Prowesses and becomes Size 3.

traits.name: Antigod
traits.description: All demons are vulnerable to anything that might sear away corruption and darkness.

traits.name: Trigger Happy
traits.description: When the Gun Demon festers, it inflicts 1 Hit on d3 targets in range 3. Gun Demons gain +1d instead of suffering Proximity when attacking adjacent fighters with ranged attacks.
